resources.string: Hello!\n We suggest you take the quiz and try to distinguish truth from lies

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Let\'s start with a simple: \n in February 2011, a girl named Facebook was born in Egypt. It\'s true?
Is it true that Facebook\'s daily audience has exceeded the number of people who lived on the planet 200 years ago?
Using a mobile phone at a gas station can cause an explosion.
If the Sun goes out, people on Earth will notice it only after 2 hours.
More than 80% of the images on the web are naked women. Is it true?
Is it true that the term \"debugging\" was coined by a woman?
Is it possible to play Tetris endlessly?
Is it true that the world\'s first programmer was a woman?
